name: Apricot-Yogurt Smoothie
description: Dried apricots, yogurt, and orange juice come together in an exotic-tasting morning libation: think mango lassi, but with apricots instead.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup plain yogurt, preferably whole milk
1 cup dried apricots, soaked in boiling water for 2 hours or room-temperature water overnight

recipeInstructions.text: Add orange juice, yogurt, ice, orange flower water, and sugar (if using) to blender. Drain apricots and add to blender. Blend on high until completely smooth, about 30 seconds. Divide between two glasses and serve immediately.
